date: "2/14/2020"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
#Loading Data
x <- read_csv("SpotifyDataForR5.csv",
  col_types = cols(
    Date = col_date(format = "%m/%d/%y")))

a <- x %>% 
  mutate(EasternTime = (TimeofDay)-5:00)
```


```{r}
#Trying to Visualize Minutes Listened by Time of Day
y <- x %>% 
  group_by(TimeofDay) %>% 
  mutate(totalMinutes = sum(MinutesListened))

y

ggplot(y, aes(TimeofDay, MinutesListened)) + geom_col()
```


```{r}
#Trying to Visualize Minutes Listened by Time of Day, filtering for just EST
z <- x %>% 
  group_by(TimeofDay) %>% 
  filter(Date >= "2019-09-01" & Date <= "2019-12-01") %>% 
  mutate(totalMinutesFilter = sum(MinutesListened))

z

ggplot(z, aes(TimeofDay, MinutesListened)) + geom_col()
```
